Technical Skills
Languages: R(scripts), Python

Analytical skills: Probabilistic Approaches, Data Pre-processing , Data Visualisations, Machine Learning, Tableau,NLP

Hands-on-tools: Jupyter Notebook, Kaggle Kernels, R Studio

Libraries Used: Pandas, Numpy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Tensorflow, sklearn, fancyimpute 

Other Tools: MySQL, MongoDB, MS-Excel 


Work Experience(Dec 2016-2019)

Company - DXC Technologies Pvt Ltd, Noida                                     Duration - 2.4 years
Designation- Associate Product Developer  

Roles and Responsibilities:-
The project done is related to the Insurance domain where the previous statistics and data were used to derive the risks of giving loan and policies to the customers.
My responsibilities included doing below several tasks:
1)Worked on Agile methodology
    2) Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.
   3) Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
   4)  Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
   5)  Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, risk assessment of giving loans, customer targeting and other business outcomes.
   6) Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
   7)Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy.
   8)Using machine learning techniques to select features, build, and optimize classifiers
   9)Processing, sorting, and double-checking data integrity for proper data analysis

Projects elaboration

· Project 1: Employee Absenteeism








Project Link: https://github.com/ROMIKAMK/Employee_absenteeism
Project Overview: To predict the employee absenteeism in a firm based upon the previous year’s data
Models implemented: Linear Regression, Decision Tree, Random Forest,Gradient Boosting
Tools Used: R-Studio, Jupyter Notebook,MS-Word,Tableau,Excel

· Project 2: Bike Renting prediction








Project Link: https://github.com/ROMIKAMK/Bike-Renting-Prediction
Project Overview: To predict the no. of bikes being rented based upon various climatic and weather conditions
Models implemented: Linear Regression, Decision Tree, Random Forest
Tools Used: R-Studio, Jupyter Notebook,MS-Word,Tableau,Excel

· Project 3: Cab Fare Prediction

Project Link: https://github.com/ROMIKAMK/Cab-Fare-Prediction
Project Overview: To predict the cab fare based upon several factors such as the distance,no. of persons travelling
Models implemented: Linear Regression, Decision Tree, Random Forest,KNN
Tools Used: R-Studio,Jupyter Notebook,MS-Word,Tableau,Excel

Ease of Doing Business in Bengal
The objective is to assist the investors in setting up industries with investment of above Rs 10 Crore in West Bengal, the Government of West Bengal had created a Single Window Cell, named Shilpa Sathi in WBIDC in 2012, where an investor can physically submit a Common Application Form for several clearances from different authorities. Officers of the aforesaid authorities sit in the Single Window Cell on specific days of the week on a roster.
State government departments and agencies have implemented a number of reforms for Ease of Doing Business (EODB) in the State. These reforms are as per Business Reforms Action Plan (BRAP) 2017.Time-bound delivery of services have been mandated under Right to Public Services (RTPS) Act 2013.Based on specific Government orders and notifications, timelines have become legally enforceable and Departments need to adhere to the mandated timelines.
